name: GEO Master
description: GEO Master is a 3D geography game. This game has different learning modes. You have the opportunity to explore the globe, you can test your knowledge and then compare your score obtained during timed games on the whole planet or on the continent of your choice ! Learn, remember and enter friendly competitions !
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10 Processor: Core2 Duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon DirectX: Version 5.2 Storage: 300 MB available space
